start_message: Welcome to Translator Bot! I can translate your messages between different languages. Just send me any text!
help_message:
📚 Available commands:

/translate - Start translation
/history - View translation history
/setlanguage - Change language
/clear_history - Clear your history

💡 Simply send me text and I'll translate it automatically!
translate_message: Please send me text to translate. I'll automatically detect the language.
translate_prompt: Enter the text you want to translate:
translate_example: Example: just send text to the bot for translation from English to Russian.
setlanguage_message: Please choose your preferred interface language:
language_set_error: ❌ Error setting language. Please try again.
language_chosen: Language has been set to English
no_history: 📭 No translation history found. Send me some text to translate!
translation_error: ❌ Translation error. Please try again later.
start:
Welcome to Translator Bot! 🤖

I can help you translate text between different languages. Choose an action below to get started!
admin_access_denied: ❌ You don't have access to this command.
admin_panel_welcome: 🛠️ Admin Panel Welcome to the administration panel. Choose an action:
admin_error: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again.
admin_broadcast_enter_message: 📢 Broadcast Message Enter the message you want to send to all users:
admin_broadcast_preview: 📢 Broadcast Preview Message: {message} Will be sent to: {user_count} users Confirm sending?
admin_ban_enter_user_id: 🚫 Ban User Enter the user ID to ban:
admin_ban_confirm: 🚫 Ban User Are you sure you want to ban user {user_id}?
admin_ban_invalid_id: ❌ Invalid user ID. Please enter a number.
admin_unban_enter_user_id: ✅ Unban User Enter the user ID to unban:
admin_unban_confirm: ✅ Unban User Are you sure you want to unban user {user_id}?
admin_unban_invalid_id: ❌ Invalid user ID. Please enter a number.
admin_banned_list_empty: 📋 Banned Users No users are currently banned.
